title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 337.9 - Maximum accumulation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 337.9 - Maximum accumulation

State Regulations

Accumulation of sick leave credits pursuant to sections
337.7
and
337.8
of this Part shall not exceed
225 days; provided, however, in the case of part-time employees who accrue sick
leave on a pro rata basis, the maximum accumulation shall also be determined on
a pro rata basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
337.9

Amended

New

York State Register May 15, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 20, eff. 5/15/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
